title: Feature 16: Session Sharing
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Export and share session state with teammates. See plans/16-session-sharing.md
close_reason: Implemented Feature 16: Session Sharing. Added shared.html view page and routing. Backend/frontend share/export functions were pre-existing.

title: Feature 04: Cost Tracking
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Show estimated API costs per session based on token usage. See plans/04-cost-tracking.md

title: Feature 02: Session Grouping
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Group sessions by project, branch, or status for better organization. See plans/02-session-grouping.md
close_reason: Feature 02 already fully implemented in app.js (lines 1096-1180) and styles.css (lines 309-359). Includes: groupSessionsByProject(), toggleGroup() with localStorage persistence, renderGroups(), CSS styles, sorting by active count, and Unknown fallback.

title: Deacon Patrol
description: Mayor's daemon patrol loop for handling callbacks, health checks, and cleanup.

title: Feature 10: Performance Metrics
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Show response times, tool usage, and other metrics. See plans/10-performance-metrics.md
close_reason: Implemented Performance Metrics feature with metrics modal, session card preview, and CSS styling

title: Feature 13: Keyboard Shortcuts
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Navigate and control sessions via keyboard. See plans/13-keyboard-shortcuts.md
close_reason: Feature already implemented - keyboard shortcuts (j/k/arrows, 1-9 jump, Enter focus, c copy, / search, ? help) working

title: Feature 09: Conversation Peek
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Preview recent conversation in expandable panel. See plans/09-conversation-peek.md
close_reason: Feature 09: Conversation Peek already fully implemented - all code present in codebase

title: Feature 20: Git Integration
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Show git status, commits, and PRs per session. See plans/20-git-integration.md
close_reason: Feature 20 already fully implemented: git_tracker.py (status/commits/diff/PR), /api/sessions/{id}/git endpoint, frontend git status cards + modal, complete CSS styling

title: Feature 11: Session Templates
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Save and reuse session configurations. See plans/11-session-templates.md
close_reason: Feature already fully implemented in main codebase. Backend has all 4 API endpoints (list/create/delete/use). Frontend has template library modal, save-as-template action in menus, and complete styling.

title: Feature 12: Session Notes
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Add user notes and annotations to sessions. See plans/12-session-notes.md

title: Feature 17: Multi-Machine Support
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Aggregate sessions from multiple machines. See plans/17-multi-machine-support.md

title: Feature 07: Browser Notifications
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Desktop notifications when sessions change state. See plans/07-notifications.md
close_reason: Implemented notification settings panel with granular controls for onActive, onWaiting, and onWarning. Added localStorage persistence, keyboard shortcuts (n for settings, m for mute), test notification button, and permission status display.

title: Witness Patrol
description: Per-rig worker monitor patrol loop with progressive nudging.

title: Refinery Patrol
description: Merge queue processor patrol loop with verification gates.

title: Feature 06: Quick Actions
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Add kill session, open in terminal, copy ID actions. See plans/06-quick-actions.md
close_reason: Feature already fully implemented - all Quick Actions functionality (copy session ID, copy resume command, open JSONL, kill session, toast notifications, action menu) present in codebase

title: Feature 03: Token Usage Visualization
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Visual progress bar showing context window usage. See plans/03-token-usage-visualization.md
close_reason: Implemented token usage visualization with color-coded progress bar (green 0-50%, yellow 50-80%, red 80-100% with pulsing animation)

title: Feature 14: Sound Effects
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Audio cues for session state changes. See plans/14-sound-effects.md
close_reason: Feature 14 Sound Effects already fully implemented: SoundManager with Web Audio API tones, settings UI, header controls, keyboard shortcut M, triggers on state changes

title: Feature 01: Session Search & Filter
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Add search bar and filters to find specific sessions by name, project, or status. See plans/01-session-search-filter.md
close_reason: Feature already fully implemented. Verified: HTML filters UI (index.html:46-54), JS filterSessions() with 150ms debounce (app.js:717-761), CSS styling (styles.css:257-307), empty state handling, and session count updates all present and functional.

title: Feature 15: AI Summary
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Claude-generated summaries of session activity. See plans/15-ai-summary.md
close_reason: Feature 15 AI Summary complete - Anthropic integration with caching and frontend display

title: Feature 08: Session Comparison
description:
dispatched_by: unknown

Side-by-side comparison of multiple sessions. See plans/08-session-comparison.md
